adjective.description: Relating to or characterized by industry.
Very great in extent or amount.
examples: we are seeing tax avoidance on an industrial scale
they quaff industrial quantities of beer

adjective.description: Relating to or denoting a type of harsh, uncompromising rock music incorporating sounds resembling those produced by industrial machinery.

origin: Late 15th century: from industry + -al; in later use influenced by French industriel.
